TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to Alexenander Calvit, 04-xx-1827

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with Alexander Calvit, April 16, 1827. Bill and price list.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1631-1632

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with Alexander Calvit, April 16, 1827. Bill and price list.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Colo, Stephen F. Austin, Dr.*/person_mentioned*,*/p* *p*To *person_mentioned*Alexr Calvit*/person_mentioned*.*/p* *p* *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1826">1826 */date_mentioned* To 4 loads of wood,____________________________________15.00*/p*
*p*To hire of 2 *person_mentioned*Negro Men*/person_mentioned*, 1 day and found in Boating_____ 3.00*/p*
*p*To 1 Man 1 1/2 days $1.50 do Oxen and Cart $4_______________ 5. 50*/p* *p*To 110 lbs Beefe do 106 lbs @ 5 Ots_______________________10. 80*/p*
*p*To 1 1/2 Bushells of Corn Pr *person_mentioned*Indians*/person_mentioned*________.___________________ 1. 50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1826">1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-14-1826">June 14*/date_mentioned* To 140 lbs Beefe @ $5 pr Hund_______________________ 7.00*/p* *p*20 1/2 Bushell Corn Pr Selfe for *location_mentioned*Cow River Expedition*/location_mentioned*_______ . 50 the hire of *person_mentioned*Cion */person_mentioned*will be settled with *person_mentioned*Mrs- Long*/person_mentioned*___._______ $24*/p*
*p*26 32 lbs Beefe by *person_mentioned*J. B. Austin.*/person_mentioned* @ 5/_____________________ 1.10*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-29-1826">Aug. 29*/date_mentioned* Your assumsit in favor of *person_mentioned*Ingram*/person_mentioned*----------------------------------- 9.25*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="09-11-1826">Sept. 9*/date_mentioned* 4 loads of wood 4---------------------------____________________ 4.0*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="10-09-1826">Octr. 9*/date_mentioned* 1 load of wood______________________________.__________ 1.00*/p*
*p*20 2 loads of wood________________________________________ 2.00*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="11-08-1826">Nov. 8 */date_mentioned*1 load wood___________________________________________ 1.00*/p* *p*To riming and Spoaking 2 Cart wheeles--------.----------------------15. 00*/p* *p*28 To 1 load wood $1 provisions for—.50_____________________ 1. 50*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="12-04-1826">Dec 4*/date_mentioned* 20 lbs Beefe @ 5 ets Jany 3d 1827—1 load wood_________ 2. 00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1827">1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-10-1827">Jany 10*/date_mentioned* 20 lbs Beefe @ 5 cts___________________________________ 1.00*/p*
*p*Cash lent on *person_mentioned*Col° Butlar*/person_mentioned*_____________________________18.00*/p*
*p*Your assumsit of Do _______________________________26. 50*/p*
*p*Your assumit of *person_mentioned*Robisons */person_mentioned*act___________________________ 5. 25*/p*
*p*Your part of Boat at Ferry______________________________ 8.00*/p*
*p*12 *person_mentioned*Mr. G Smiths*/person_mentioned* Grave__________________________________.___ 4.00*/p*
*p*40 Barrels of Corn loand you @ 1.50_____________________60.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-16-1827">Aprl. 16*/date_mentioned* To hailing 1 load Corn from River by*person_mentioned* J. B. Austin*/person_mentioned*_„___._______ 1. 00*/p*
*p*216. 40*/p* *p*Rec d Payment in full*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Alexr Calvit*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Mr. S. M. Williams Dr.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To 2 Bushels Corn by *person_mentioned*Washington*/person_mentioned*________________________ $2.00*/p*
*p*216. 50*/p* *p*Pd *person_mentioned*Commissioner*/person_mentioned*-------------------------------.---------------------- 10.00*/p*
*p*Carrd. ford_____________________________________________________ 226. 50*/p*
*p*Amt. Brot Forward_____________________________________________226.50*/p*
*p*By One League of Land_________________________________168.00*/p*
*p*Stamp paper_____________________________________________ 3. 00*/p*
*p*Two Labors 22 1/2 varas_____________________________________ 45.00*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S M Williams*/person_mentioned* fee for drawing just title_____________________ 10. 00*/p*
*p*Do Do your------------------------------------_------------------------*/p*
*p*Last Years ------------------_--------------------------_------------------- 228. 50*/p*
*p*Due *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* _______________________.____________„____ 2*/p*.
*/div1*
